title: G002: Keystone Chainsaw E2E Test Suite
description: Create the full Chainsaw E2E test suite in tests/e2e/keystone/: basic-deployment/ (happy path, all conditions Ready=True), missing-secret/ (SecretsReady=False, recovery on Secret creation), fernet-rotation/ (CronJob schedule, manual trigger, key update, rolling restart), scale/ (replicas 3 to 5 to 2), deletion-cleanup/ (owner reference garbage collection), policy-overrides/ (policy.yaml in ConfigMap, oslo_policy config), middleware-config/ (api-paste.ini pipeline modification), brownfield-database/ (explicit host/port, no MariaDB CRs), image-upgrade/ (rolling update, Ready maintained).
